languages.text: "Предположу, что это было не покушение, а обычный налет. Бестолочи не знали, что встретятся с вами, Лорд-капитан. Впрочем, быть начеку все равно не помешает. Великим случалось умирать от рук ничтожных, мы совсем недавно в этом убедились..." {n}Абеляр хмурится и трет переносицу, словно от усталости.{/n}

"I would wager that this was not an assassination attempt, but rather a common raid. The halfwits had no idea that they would run into you, Lord Captain. Still, it wouldn't hurt to be on our guard. The great have been known to fall to the pathetic, we can attest to this from our recent experience..." {n}Abelard frowns and rubs the bridge of his nose as if fatigued.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Предположу, что это было не покушение, а обычный налет. Бестолочи не знали, что встретятся с вами, Лорд-капитан. Впрочем, быть начеку все равно не помешает. Великим случалось умирать от рук ничтожных, мы совсем недавно в этом убедились..." {n}Абеляр хмурится и трет переносицу, словно от усталости.{/n}

The great have been known to fall to the pathetic, we can attest to this from our recent experience..." {n}Abelard frowns and rubs the bridge of his nose as if fatigued.{/n}

languages.text: 「個人的に、これは暗殺未遂ではなく一般的な襲撃だったと推測します。まさかロード・キャプテンであるあなたに出くわすとは、間抜けどもは思いもしなかったのでしょう。それでも用心するに越したことはありません。古来より、偉大な人物が下等な者の手で葬られる話はよく聞きます。最近の経験からも、その可能性がおおいにあることがわかります…」{n}アベラルドは疲労したかのように眉をひそめ、鼻柱を指でかいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this was not an assassination attempt, but rather a common raid. The halfwits had no idea that they would run into you, Lord Captain. Still, it wouldn't hurt to be on our guard. The great have been known to fall to the pathetic, we can attest to this from our recent experience..." {n}Abelard frowns and rubs the bridge of his nose as if fatigued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「個人的に、これは暗殺未遂ではなく一般的な襲撃だったと推測します。まさかロード・キャプテンであるあなたに出くわすとは、間抜けどもは思いもしなかったのでしょう。それでも用心するに越したことはありません。古来より、偉大な人物が下等な者の手で葬られる話はよく聞きます。最近の経験からも、その可能性がおおいにあることがわかります…」{n}アベラルドは疲労したかのように眉をひそめ、鼻柱を指でかいた。{/n}

languages.text: “我敢说，这并不是一场暗杀，而是一次普通的突袭。那些蠢货根本不知道会碰到您，舰长大人。不过，保持警惕也无妨。众所周知，即便是那些伟人物，也往往会落入可鄙之人的手中。我们最近的经历可以证明这一点……”{n}阿贝拉德皱起眉头，揉揉鼻梁，似乎很疲惫。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this was not an assassination attempt, but rather a common raid. The halfwits had no idea that they would run into you, Lord Captain. Still, it wouldn't hurt to be on our guard. The great have been known to fall to the pathetic, we can attest to this from our recent experience..." {n}Abelard frowns and rubs the bridge of his nose as if fatigued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我敢说，这并不是一场暗杀，而是一次普通的突袭。那些蠢货根本不知道会碰到您，舰长大人。不过，保持警惕也无妨。众所周知，即便是那些伟人物，也往往会落入可鄙之人的手中。我们最近的经历可以证明这一点……”{n}阿贝拉德皱起眉头，揉揉鼻梁，似乎很疲惫。{/n}

languages.text: «Diría que esto no ha sido un intento de asesinato, sino más bien un asalto normal y corriente. Los muy pazguatos no tenían ni idea de que se toparían con usted, Lord Capitán. Aun así, no estaría de más ser precavidos. No sería la primera vez que un grande sucumbe ante los más patéticos; podemos dar fe de ello por experiencia reciente...». {n}Abelard frunce el ceño y se frota el puente de la nariz como si estuviera fatigado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this was not an assassination attempt, but rather a common raid. The halfwits had no idea that they would run into you, Lord Captain. Still, it wouldn't hurt to be on our guard. The great have been known to fall to the pathetic, we can attest to this from our recent experience..." {n}Abelard frowns and rubs the bridge of his nose as if fatigued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Diría que esto no ha sido un intento de asesinato, sino más bien un asalto normal y corriente. Los muy pazguatos no tenían ni idea de que se toparían con usted, Lord Capitán. Aun así, no estaría de más ser precavidos. No sería la primera vez que un grande sucumbe ante los más patéticos; podemos dar fe de ello por experiencia reciente...». {n}Abelard frunce el ceño y se frota el puente de la nariz como si estuviera fatigado.{/n}

languages.text: « Je n'y verrais pas nécessairement une tentative d'assassinat, mais plutôt une attaque comme une autre. Ces imbéciles ne se doutaient pas un seul instant qu'ils tomberaient sur vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Cela étant, nous ferions bien de rester sur nos gardes. Même les plus pathétiques peuvent parfois l'emporter sur les plus grands, comme notre récente expérience nous l'a montré... » {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils et se frotte le nez comme s'il était fatigué.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this was not an assassination attempt, but rather a common raid. The halfwits had no idea that they would run into you, Lord Captain. Still, it wouldn't hurt to be on our guard. The great have been known to fall to the pathetic, we can attest to this from our recent experience..." {n}Abelard frowns and rubs the bridge of his nose as if fatigued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je n'y verrais pas nécessairement une tentative d'assassinat, mais plutôt une attaque comme une autre. Ces imbéciles ne se doutaient pas un seul instant qu'ils tomberaient sur vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Cela étant, nous ferions bien de rester sur nos gardes. Même les plus pathétiques peuvent parfois l'emporter sur les plus grands, comme notre récente expérience nous l'a montré... » {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils et se frotte le nez comme s'il était fatigué.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich möchte wetten, dass das kein Mordanschlag war, sondern ein ganz normaler Überfall. Die Idioten hatten keine Ahnung, dass sie auf Euch stoßen würden, Lord Captain. Dennoch könnte es nicht schaden, wenn wir wachsam blieben. Die Großen werden oft durch die Jämmerlichen gefällt, das bestätigen unsere aktuellen Erfahrungen ..." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht und reibt sich den Nasenrücken, als wäre er erschöpft.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this was not an assassination attempt, but rather a common raid. The halfwits had no idea that they would run into you, Lord Captain. Still, it wouldn't hurt to be on our guard. The great have been known to fall to the pathetic, we can attest to this from our recent experience..." {n}Abelard frowns and rubs the bridge of his nose as if fatigued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte wetten, dass das kein Mordanschlag war, sondern ein ganz normaler Überfall. Die Idioten hatten keine Ahnung, dass sie auf Euch stoßen würden, Lord Captain. Dennoch könnte es nicht schaden, wenn wir wachsam blieben. Die Großen werden oft durch die Jämmerlichen gefällt, das bestätigen unsere aktuellen Erfahrungen ..." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht und reibt sich den Nasenrücken, als wäre er erschöpft.{/n}

languages.text: "Kanımca suikast teşebbüsüne değil, sıradan bir baskına uğradık. Belli ki bu yarım akıllılar size denk gelmeyi beklemiyorlardı Lord Kaptan. Yine de temkinli olmakta fayda var. Nice büyük şahsiyetin zavallılara kurban gittiği bilinir, yaşadığımız bu deneyim de bunu ispatlar nitelikte zaten." {n}Abelard kaşlarını çatıyor ve bitkin düşmüşçesine burun kemiğini ovuşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would wager that this was not an assassination attempt, but rather a common raid. The halfwits had no idea that they would run into you, Lord Captain. Still, it wouldn't hurt to be on our guard. The great have been known to fall to the pathetic, we can attest to this from our recent experience..." {n}Abelard frowns and rubs the bridge of his nose as if fatigued.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İddiaya girerim ki bu bir suikast girişimi değil, sıradan bir baskındı. Bu yarım akıllılar size denk gelmeyi beklemiyorlardı Lord Kaptan. Yine de temkinli olmaktan zarar gelmez. Birçok ulu kimsenin zavallılara kurban gittiği bilinir, yakın zamanda yaşadığımız deneyim de bunu ispatlar nitelikte zaten." {n}Abelard kaşlarını çatıyor ve bitkin düşmüşcesine burnunun köprüsünü ovuşturuyor.{/n}
